mapper.sql: t.id as id , t.proId as proId , t.verify_code as verifyCode , t.mobile as mobile , t.sms_type as smsType , t.send_status as sendStatus , t.use_status as useStatus , t.sms_content as smsContent , t.result as result , t.send_time as sendTime , t.update_time as updateTime , t.request_ip as requestIp , t.tenant_id as tenantId
mapper.insert:
insert into t_sms_log
id,
proId,
verify_code,
mobile,
sms_type,
send_status,
use_status,
sms_content,
result,
send_time,
update_time,
request_ip,
tenant_id,
#{id},
#{proId},
#{verifyCode},
#{mobile},
#{smsType},
#{sendStatus},
#{useStatus},
#{smsContent},
#{result},
#{sendTime},
#{updateTime},
#{requestIp},
#{tenantId},
mapper.update:
update t_sms_log
proId = #{proId},
verify_code = #{verifyCode},
mobile = #{mobile},
sms_type = #{smsType},
send_status = #{sendStatus},
use_status = #{useStatus},
sms_content = #{smsContent},
result = #{result},
send_time = #{sendTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
request_ip = #{requestIp},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
where id = #{id}
